definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
to stop/to pause/to arrange/to lay out/to kowtow/to stamp (one's foot)/at once/classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal

sentences.chinese: 西頓夫人大笑着表示同意。

sentences.english: Also, they lived a long way from the Sidonians and had no relationship with anyone else.
sentences.chinese: 他們離西頓人也遠，與別人沒有來往。

sentences.english: There was no one to rescue them because they lived a long way from Sidon and had no relationship with anyone else.
sentences.chinese: 因爲離西頓遠，他們又與別人沒有來往。

sentences.english: Skelton , Bond and Seton all suffered extreme damage to their cars .
sentences.chinese: 債券市場和西頓所有遭受極度破壞他們的汽車。

sentences.english: He dared not intrude on the magical moment between his brother and Seton.
sentences.chinese: 喬納斯不敢侵擾他弟弟和西頓的美妙時刻。

sentences.english: Heaton is yet to make a first-team appearance for United.
sentences.chinese: 西頓目前還沒有代表曼聯一線隊上場的記錄。
